p:
The compounds were identified based on their GC retention indices on both columns and through their mass spectra. Retention indices, calculated by linear interpolation relative to the retention times of C 8–C 24 n-alkanes (Eq. 1)
62 , were compared with those of authentic products included in the Faculty of Pharmacy of the University of Coimbra laboratory database and/or literature data
63, 64 . Acquired mass spectra were compared with reference spectra from the laboratory database, Wiley/NIST library and literature data
63, 65 . Relative amounts of individual components were calculated based on GC raw data areas without a response factor correction for flame ionization detection.
1
